description: Wells Lamont 133LF Latex Coated Work Gloves protect your hands while you're hard at work. The latex coating on the palm helps keep your hands dry, while also resisting abrasion, cuts, and tears. The crinkle finish of the latex gives you extra gripping power. The gloves have breathable fabric on the back to keep your hands comfortable. These gloves are perfect for farming, gardening, landscaping, painting, cleaning, and automotive use. These Wells Lamont Latex Coated Work Gloves come in a 3 pair pack. Wells Lamont â€“ Stubborn about Quality since 1907.

Wells Lamont 133LF Latex Coated Work Gloves, Knit Wrist, Textured Grip, Large, 3-Pairs - A truly versatile glove and a favorite amongst all glove users. Latex palm coating over a medium weight machine knit shell with elasticized wrist that keeps out dirt and debris. The crinkle finish latex coating provides great wet and dry grip, minimal chemical resistance, and pretty good cut and puncture resistance. While the coating is waterproof the back of the hand is not. Every tool box, garage, shed, or warehouse should have these gloves on hand.
